des:
• Summary

Highlights Storybooks from Bamboo boosts kids’ reading and listening comprehension through interactive Highlights professionally narrated stories. Highlights’ unique approach to “Fun with a Purpose” helps engage children through entertaining stories, while also promoting skills that help lead to success in school – and beyond! 


• Basic Use (How it works)

Children and parents can start the skill by asking Alexa to “Open Highlights Storybooks.” They then can select a reading exercise level and story. A friendly narrator begins reading selections from the storybook. After each narration, children are asked questions about the story, which they can verbally answer. Alexa identifies whether the answer is correct or incorrect. 


Navigation tips:
Say “Alexa, open Highlights Storybooks” to open skill
Say “Level 1”, “Level 2”, or “Level 3” to change difficulty
Say “Switch Books” to change story
Say “Give me a Hint” to get a hint
Say “Alexa, stop” to exit


• Story Titles (content available) 

Level 1: Enjoy the Show, Bea and Lop, Pigs in My Garden, Davy Duck's Grumpy Day
Level 2: Lulu Builds a Choo-Choo, Little Bunny Celebrates Spring, The Lucky Penny, Time for a Party
Level 3: Robin's Best Nest, Balto the Sled Dog, In the Rain Forest, The Skeleton Crew

MORE levels and stories to come! 


• Development evidence 

How will this help my child? 
- Fosters reading skills for both readers and pre-readers to expand vocabulary, hone grammar and better prepare for tests 
- Sparks interest and imagination with audio stories, a new and different way of learning
- Increases engagement and independence with child-friendly content and interface

Why is this fun for kids? 
- Professionally voiced storytelling conveys depth and emotion, engaging children in multisensory experiences and brings reading to life. 
- Multiple genres allow kids to choose stories that appeal to them, building a passion for reading. 
- Wide variety of stories, themes and reading levels encourage hours of engagement and learning!


• Bamboo Grove (Optional Parent Portal) & Account Linking

Registration on Bamboo Grove provides results about how children are progressing, so parents can understand their strengths and areas for development & view badges awarded. Parents can register for a FREE Bamboo Learning account on Bamboo Grove at grove.bamboolearning.com. 

After signing up for a Bamboo Learning account, parents need to link that account with the Highlights Storybooks Alexa skill by opening the Alexa App (or going to alexa.amazon.com) and then search for Highlights Storybooks within the skills section of the Alexa App. After finding Highlights Storybooks in the Alexa App, select “Settings”, and then “Link Account”. A Bamboo Learning screen will appear. Sign in to the Bamboo Learning account and Highlights Storybook will be linked. Then visit Bamboo Grove at grove.bamboolearning.com to view progress.


• About Highlights / Bamboo

Highlights is a beloved global media brand dedicated to inspiring children to become Curious, Creative, Caring and Confident individuals. Through print and digital content that encourages thinking, creativity, self-expression and respect, Highlights helps kids build literacy, and other school and life skills, all while having fun. Highlights’ magazines, book clubs, apps, activity packs and more bring kids “Fun with a Purpose,” anytime, anywhere. To learn more and to connect with Highlights, visit Highlights.com.
